example.description: This example deletes the role named MyNewRole from the current IAM account. Before you can delete the role you must first use the Unregister-IAMRolePolicy command to detach any managed policies. Inline policies are deleted with the role.

example.code: PS C:\>Get-IAMAttachedRolePolicies -RoleName MyNewRole | Unregister-IAMRolePolicy -RoleName MyNewRole PS C:\>Remove-IAMRole -RoleName MyNewRole
example.description: This example detaches any managed policies from the role named MyNewRole and then deletes the role. The first line retrieves any managed policies attached to the role as a collection and then detaches each policy in the collection from the role. The second line deletes the role itself. Inline policies are deleted along with the role.
